text: Another one got past the tutorial? Already? Well, time to do the old schtick again…
Ahem! OK, then: You think you are ready to take on the Legends? Is that a yes? I’ll start you up with a single trap.
Off you go then!
This is going pretty good.
Your journey has just begun though. So keep it up! These Legends don’t write themselves.
Well, they sort of do but that is a whole other thing. As you were!
Well, this is going great!
You're blazing through this Legend like its nobody’s business!
Here, I'll give you some money! Use it to buy a couple of narrow chokes. To use them on the range, press the '1' key and blast away!
Good job!
You’ve almost finished this Legend! I must admit I was a little sceptical at first but you have proven me wrong.
Respect.
Good job!
So you made it through. Well done, that was just the first Legend, there are plenty more waiting for you.
So why don’t you scurry along and take on the next Legend? I’ll be seeing you!
What exactly is a Legend, you ask? Well, that is one of the great mysteries in life!
Like “Why does it rain?” or “Who built the Eiffel Tower?” - we just don’t know these things and that’s what makes life so exciting!
Now: Onto the second Legend and the legendary two target double trap!
That was not too difficult for you at all! You’re making great progress!
I almost feel a bit proud over you. But don’t let it go to your head! You still have lot’s of work to do.
So what are you waiting for?
It seems to me you’re a natural at this. Keep on keepin’ on!
Well, well, well...you got your sights set on the third Legend I see.
And you’re not too far away!
Venture forth!
Double the targets and traps makes no difference for you.
Two Legends down and plenty more to go!
This is the third Legend and oh boy is it a great one!
It’s so good I’ll add two exclamation marks to this sentence!!
We are talking about proper skeet shooting now. Hurry on with it!
Close shave! No? Well I thought things got a bit hairy.
But let’s cut to the chase: More difficulties ahead but you so no time for dilly dallying.
Things are looking pretty good!
Skeet shooting is right up your alley! Keep this up and we’ll all be home by supper.
These skeet ranges ain't got nothin on you. However, things are about to get rough so you’ll need to focus more than ever before.
You can do this!
Go!
No problems for you, eh?
I promise you to let things get a little more hectic in the next Legend.
